column5: went out and did a bit of fishing and saw this gar   Then I landed this mirror carp that I saw 2 yrs back. It was half the size it was now. But it was alot smarter back then. So I guess when they get older they get...     ok ok, so the water color is differnet. I was fishing two different places but not the same day of course.  I'm really happy about the mirror. Its been how long...5+ yrs since I started carp fishing and never landed or had one on.  dsn
Congrats DSN! i've gotta steal some of your secret mirror bait so i can catch one.  Great pics too!
Great report and pics dsn Congratulation Thanks for sharing Leechman

Congrats Carp Addict!  Nice Mirror  Was the gar in T.O? At the Islands?  In my three years fishing in Canada, I never managed to catch or even see a gar, pity they look kinda cool.  How's the back these days mate?  007
